title: Accounts login
content: Firefox gives me a blank screen when I try to login to my accounts
creator: kozborn

title: Trouble setting up Thunderbird on new PC with WIN11
content: Hi, Sadly having big problems transferring Thunderbird onto new WIN11 PC. Been at it for some days now.... The old PC's C drive is now installed on the new PC (as a spare drive) so all the original Thunderbird files are still intact I believe. I have always kept my email files in separate dated folders on the old PC HD and so have about 27Gb of data (965 files in 111 folders) all under AppData/Roaming/Thunderbird/Profiles/xxxxdefault However after installing latest Thunderbird version and trying to substitute the above original profile I find the old stored files are not visible on opening Thunderbird. the software tries to download huge number of files from the server, and there is no Address Book data from previous old PC install. Appreciate all ideas to stop me losing more of my scarce hair :-) Thanks in anticipation. Keith Dekok keithdekok@gmail.com Australia
creator: keithdekok

title: Manage by your organisation???
content:
My firefox browser being hack multiple times, so I dident use it for multiples years... Now I just want to give it an other chance by removing everything that could create trouble. When I get over the setting windows I can read this: Information Your browser is being managed by your organisation.

I don't understand, this is my private computer. How to remove this organisation management???
creator: altamea
